# <a name="keyboard-shortcuts-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="f90c4-102">Tipkovni prečaci u programu Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f90c4-102">Keyboard shortcuts in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f90c4-103">U programu Outlook.com možete koristiti iste tipkovne prečace kao servis za e-poštu s kojim radite, kao što su Gmail, Yahoo mail ili Outlook.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f90c4-103">In Outlook.com you can use the same keyboard shortcuts as the email service you're used to working with, such as Gmail, Yahoo Mail, or Outlook.com.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f90c4-104">Idite na [postavke pristupačnosti](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080840) (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f90c4-104">Go to [Accessibility settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080840) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="f90c4-105">**Postavke**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f90c4-105">**Settings**</span></span> 
 > <span data-ttu-id="f90c4-106">**Prikaz svih postavki**  >  programa Outlook **Općenite**  >  **Pristupačnost**) Odaberite tipkovne prečace koje želite koristiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f90c4-106">**View all Outlook settings** > **General** > **Accessibility**) and choose which keyboard shortcuts you'd like use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f90c4-107">Da biste vidjeli cijeli popis tipkovnih prečaca, pročitajte članak [Tipkovni prečaci za Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/708d907e-4398-4fc6-9a9a-4fc72bccec16?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f90c4-107">To see the full list of keyboard shortcuts, see [Outlook.com keyboard shortcuts](https://support.office.com/article/708d907e-4398-4fc6-9a9a-4fc72bccec16?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
